leukapp.apps.extractions.models module¶

Models and database schemas for the leukapp.apps.extractions application.

class Extraction(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: leukapp.apps.core.models.LeukappModel

Aliquot's nucleic acid.

Each Extraction can be linked to multiple Projects using the projects ManyToMany field. Additionally, the attribute projects_string can also be used with _get_projects_from_string() to link projects and extractions:

# This will add projects 101 and 102 to the current Extraction
projects_string = '101|102|103'
aliquot¶

ForeignKey to the Aliquot model.

analyte = None¶

Type of nucleic acid to be sequenced. See ANALYTE for available choices.

projects¶

Many to many relationship with the model Project.

projects_string = None¶

String used by _get_projects_from_string() to link Projects and Extractions.

technology = None¶

Sequencing TECHNOLOGY.

platform = None¶

Sequencing PLATFORM.

center = None¶

Sequencing CENTER.

ext_id = None¶

ID used by the sequencing CENTER to identify Extractions.

The default value is UNKNOWN because most likely, scientist don’t know this ID when they are submitting Extractions to leukgen.

int_id = None¶

Internal ID used to describe the Extraction object.

This value is generated by _get_int_id() and it includes crucial information separated by a - character (e.g. D1-1).

  • D1 indicates that the current Extraction is the first DNA extracted from an Aliquot.
  • 1 indicates the TECHNOLOGY_PLATFORM code.

The int_id is generated only once. If there was a mistake a new Extraction instance must be created.

slug = None¶

Extraction's unique identifier (leukid).

The int_id is added to the Aliquot.slug to generate the slug.

As the int_id, the slug is generated only once. If there was a mistake a new Extraction instance must be created.

_if_new(**kwargs)[source]¶

Executed only when the object is created.

This method can only be called from save() and is protected by _check_if_caller_is_save().

_if_save()[source]¶

Executed everytime the object is saved.

This method can only be called from save() and is protected by _check_if_caller_is_save().

_get_projects_from_string()[source]¶

Links Extractions to Projects <leukapp.apps.projects.models.Project>` using projects_string.

Projects primary keys (pk`s) must be separated by a ``|` character.

_get_int_id()[source]¶

Computes the int_id.

The int_id generation is based on a count of Extractions per Aliquot, and the combination of the sequencing TECHNOLOGY and PLATFORM used.

Steps:

  • Check if the caller function is _if_new().
  • Retrieve the ID character assigned to the analyte attribute. updates the extractions count and saves the Parent class, and builds the first section of the ID (e.g. D1).
  • Assigns the TECHNOLOGY_PLATFORM code.

This method can only be called from _if_new() and is protected by _check_if_caller_is_if_new().
